ActorTalk: Galaxy Fashion, Kuroro Coffee, Kowloong Restaurant... Today was full of interesting moments, now that I think back.
Of course, Commandant. I'm truly happy I got to spend this relaxing time with you.
What about you, Commandant? Have you been enjoying the break?
(The words I want to say... they won't come out. Is it because we're nearing the reset point...? Drowsiness is flooding in, and I can't stop it...)
All day today, I've had the sense that something's been weighing on your mind. Maybe now's not the right time to talk about it, and I trust you have your reasons.
But if it's something troubling you, something difficult to face alone, I hope you'll tell me. We can find a way through it together.
It's not often we get time off like this. I hope you can let go of your worries, relax, and enjoy every moment of it.
Getting tired? If you're sleepy, you should get some rest.
Commandant, were you about to say something?
Sorry, I couldn't quite catch that. But it's okay. I'll be right here with you. Whatever it is, you can tell me tomorrow.
